content: chains between the single crochet and the triple crochet stitches this causes the triple crochets to squish down and make small bobbles giving the pouch front some texture pouch front row 1 with brown thread and larger hook chain 4 loosely join into a ring with a slip_stitch ch1 work 7 single_crochet into the ring place a stitch marker do not join row work continuously moving the stitch marker at the completion of each row row 2 work 2 single_crochet in each stitch of the previous row 7 increases made 14 stitches row 3 *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 1 single_crochet in the next stitch repeat from * around to marker 21 stitches row 4 work 1 single_crochet in the next stitch *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made increase made work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches repeat from * around to marker 28 stitches row 5 work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 2 stitches *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches repeat from * around to marker 35 stitches row 6 work 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 stitches *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 1 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet over the next 4 stitches repeat from * around to marker 42 stitches row 7 treble_crochet in first stitch single_crochet in next 3 stitches *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 2 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet over the next 5 stitches repeat from * around to marker 49 stitches row 8 single_crochet treble_crochet work 1sc in each of the next 3 stitches *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 3 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet over the next 6 stitches repeat from * around to marker 56 stitches row 9 2sc treble_crochet work 1sc in each of the next 3 stitches *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 1 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet over the next 7 stitches repeat from * around to marker 63 stitches row 10 treble_crochet 2sc treble_crochet over the next 4 stitches work 1sc in each of the next 3 stitches *work one treble_crochet and one single_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 2 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet 1 treble_crochet 2 single_crochet over the next 8 stitches repeat from * around to marker 70 stitches row 11 half_double_crochet in the next stitch *work 2 double_crochet in the next stitch increase made work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 9 stitches repeat from * to the marker 77 stitches row 12 *work 2 double_crochet in next stitch increase made double_crochet in each of the next 10 stitches repeat around from * 84 stitches row 13
